discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We dive deep into your goals, users, and constraints. Research-driven strategy that eliminates guesswork.

design.title: Design
design.description: Interactive prototypes and system architecture. You see and feel the product before a single line of code.

develop.title: Develop
develop.description: Agile sprints with weekly demos. Clean, tested, documented code shipped in predictable intervals.

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.description: Launch with confidence. CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and ongoing support to keep you scaling.

FinalCTA.subtitle: Let's talk about your next project. We'll scope it, plan it, and ship it — faster than you thought possible.

Services.label: Our Expertise
Services.headline: What we build
Services.description: Six core competencies, one unified team. We cover the full stack so you don't have to juggle vendors.

web.title: Web / Frontend
web.description: Pixel-perfect interfaces built with React, Next.js, and modern frameworks. Responsive, performant, and accessible.

backend.title: Backend / APIs
backend.description: Scalable server-side architecture, RESTful & GraphQL APIs, microservices, and real-time systems that handle millions of requests.

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.description: Infrastructure as code, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud-native deployments on AWS, Azure, and GCP.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform mobile experiences for iOS and Android with smooth animations and offline-first architecture.

ai_agents.title: AI Agents / LLM
ai_agents.description: Intelligent AI agents trained on your data. Automate sales, support, and business processes with integration into CRM and ERP.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Seamless third-party integrations, data pipelines, webhooks, and message queues connecting your entire tech stack.

Augmentation.label: Staff Augmentation
Augmentation.description: Skip the 6-month hiring cycle. Embed our senior engineers directly into your workflow — same timezone, same standups, same commitment.
